pkgmetadata.longdescription: Minimax and Minimax Projection Designs // The 'minimaxdesign' package provides two main functions: mMcPSO() and miniMaxPro(), which generates minimax designs and minimax projection designs using clustering and particle swarm optimization (PSO) techniques. These designs can be used in a variety of settings, e.g., as space-filling designs for computer experiments or sensor allocation designs. A detailed description of the two designs and the employed algorithms can be found in Mak and Joseph (2016).
